data.name: DoomsDay
data.detailed_description:
OVERVIEW
DoomsDay is a faction-based, PvPvE survival game set in Kentucky. Players will choose a Faction and work with, or compete against, other players to contribute to that Faction's collection of resources. As players progress, their reputation will grow with their chosen Faction and they will be rewarded with equipment and/or cosmetic items. A winning Faction will be crowned at the end of each season.

BACKGROUND
The U.S. president is assassinated on live television by a rogue domestic force. In the ensuing chaos, a nuclear blast rocks the American Midwest. The grid is knocked out across the U.S.. As the days pass, with no messages coming out of Washington D.C. and resources dwindling, regular people become desperate. It isn't long before no one is safe in their homes. Within a few weeks, groups begin forming with their own ideas for how the country should rebuild. Their numbers grow quickly as they offer shelter, safety, and food - but everyone has a role to play.

DOOMSDAY IS COMING.
ARE YOU PREPARED?

data.short_description: DoomsDay is a faction-based, PvPvE survival game set in Kentucky. Players will choose a Faction and work with, or compete against, other players to contribute to that Faction's collection of resources.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 @ 3.60 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 & equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
The game features combat including firearms. Players must compete with other players to scavenge for resources and this often means attacking other players. 

The game doesn't feature extreme gore, however. Some mild blood.
